mapper.insert: insert into employees_archives(birthday, category, dueToTime, education, address, addressNow, emergencyContact, relation, emergencyContactPhone, departureTime, ginsengTime, stopTime, note, employeeId) values (#{birthday}, #{category}, #{dueToTime}, #{education}, #{address}, #{addressNow}, #{emergencyContact}, #{relation}, #{emergencyContactPhone}, #{departureTime}, #{ginsengTime}, #{stopTime}, #{note}, #{employeeId})
mapper.select:
select t1.id as employeeArchivesId,
t2.idWork, name, idNumber, gender, inductionTime, deptName, position,
t1.birthday, category, dueToTime, education, address, addressNow, emergencyContact, relation, emergencyContactPhone, departureTime, ginsengTime, stopTime, note, employeeId from employees_archives as t1 inner join (select * from employee
and name like concat('%', #{employee.name}, '%')
and deptName like concat('%', #{employee.deptName}, '%')
and state like concat('%', #{employee.state}, '%')
and idWork like concat('%', #{employee.idWork}, '%')
) as t2 on t1.employeeId = t2.id
limit #{startIndex}, 10;
